title: TSR Chainmail 3rd Edition Rulebook ( restored )
description:
TSR Chainmail 3rd Edition Rulebook ( restored )
===============================================


Format: PDF of scanned pages
Language: English
First Published: 1979
Publisher: TSR


Chainmail rules for tabletop miniature fantasy figure wargaming ( 3rd edition 1979 ) from TSR ( first edition published in 1975 ).

This was the precursor that Gary Gygax built on to create the very first ruleset for Dungeons and Dragons.

These rules are not really roleplaying rules, more battle simulation rules for miniature fantasy figures.

I have cleaned up and restored an existing scan to make all pages legible.
